TopicTitle: Revert Chase Camera behaviour to pre-1.0?

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to force the chase camera to lock position? Currently it makes docking rather a problem. I've coming in straight, then the camera acts all fancy "I'm going full blown Hollywood action shot" and spins all over the place, and I get disorientate.

Edited June 29, 2015 by Technical Ben

Switch to locked mode.

You should have auto, orbit, free, chase, and locked.

I have noticed that locked tends to be somewhat.. upside down.
Thanks. Stupid me was toggling so fast did not see it.
